title: Ancient Aliens Theory - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/9/21
itunes:title: Ancient Aliens Theory - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/9/21
description:
George Noory and author Kathleen McGowan discuss continuing the legacy of her late husband Phil Coppens, noted for his research into ancient aliens visiting Earth, how his work led the government to release UFO documents and even convinced her to believe in extra terrestrials herself.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:summary: An examination into the theory that aliens have been visiting Earth for millions of years.
